page.title: 03Memories of School.
page.content: Looking back to my first day at school I remember I was a little nervous, but I didn't cry. I enjoyed my first day at school very much and I made several new friends. The maths were cards that we copied off. I can remember being very proud when I got onto reading book 5b. One of the sad things in my time at school was when one of my teachers left school. Each year I was a little scared of moving up into a higher class, but when I got into that class it was nowhere near as bad as I thought it would be. I have learnt a lot in these last six years. I hope to do well at the William Brookes Comprehensive School, and get a good job. Now all I have are a few more weeks and then my years in primary school will be over.
